com.yantra.api.wms.layout

Interface createLocation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    com.yantra.api.WMSApi, YIFApi

    public interface createLocation

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document createLocation(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      createLocation creates location in a zone within a node.

    • Method Detail

      • createLocation

        org.w3c.dom.Document createLocation(YFSEnvironment env,
                                    org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                             throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException,
                                    java.rmi.RemoteException

        createLocation creates location in a zone within a node. This identifies physical spaces (locations) of different sizes where inventory is stored. A location is classified as an intransit (mobile) location, a regular location, a virtual location, a staging location or a dock location. It has various attributes like aisle number, bay number etc. which help identify the physical location within a zone. The newly created locations are marked empty and available volume and weight of the location is suitably set based on location size code.

        Related Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD Error XML Error DTD

        User Exits:
        com.yantra.wms.japi.ue.WMSBeforeCreateLocationUE

        Events Raised:
        Raised during the transaction WMS_LOCATION_DEFINITION.

          AFTER_CREATE_LOCATION:
            This event is raised upon successful execution of createLocation.
            Data published - WMS_LOCATION_DEFINITION.AFTER_CREATE_LOCATION.xml

        Audits: None

        Pre Conditions: None

        Post Conditions: None

        Output Template Support: Yes

        Database Extensibility Support: Yes

        Configuration Required for Backward Compatibility: No

        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.
        inXML - Required. For more information, see the associated input xml files.

        Returns:
        An XML document that contains the Location Details. For details on the output, refer to the associated output files.

        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException - Exception containing error codes in the standard error files.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Java's default remote exception handler.
